about_the_game:
Build Your Culinary Empire!

Welcome to Tasty Business, a management game where you turn small diners into world-class restaurants! As an ambitious investor, your goal is to buy, upgrade, and expand various food businesses, creating a mouth-watering empire.

Choose how to grow:
🍔 Upgrade your restaurants – Expand menus, optimize operations, and attract more customers!
🏪 Buy new establishments – Invest in the food industry and dominate the culinary scene.
💰 Profit and reinvest – Manage your earnings to keep expanding your business.
🎭 Engage with the world – Meet unique characters and uncover secrets that can boost your success.

Can you turn a simple diner into a million-dollar restaurant chain? The fate of your culinary empire is in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1030 or superior
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: In Tasty Business, turn small restaurants into a culinary empire. Manage your businesses, source fresh ingredients, and attract customers as you expand your empire. Challenges, flavors, and new connections await. Are you ready to become the culinary mogul?
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Arabic
